quote-source: Jeremy Hardy, The News Quiz, BBC Radio 4, September 14, 2012.
quote-text: Bigots always say, well, if-if men and men and women and women have gay marriage, what next? Will people be able to marry animals?, and you think, well, you never draw the parallel between humans and animals in any other circumstance. You say, I’m going out for a drink with Brian, oh, if you’re going out with a drink with Brian, why don’t you go out for a drink with a rhinoceros, then?
